comments:
Each time I want to use "Browse file system..." (e.g. in Attach Source or in External Tools dialog Eclipse is just closing itself without a message.

My workaround is to copy the File location in the Windows Explorer and paste it in the textfield.

Does the VM generate a thread dump when Eclipse crashes? Typically, this is a file that ends up in the eclipse directory, or in the directory from which you started Eclipse.

Created an attachment (id=76169)
Errorfile after clicking File open...

There is a file written to the working directory (attached now)

This issue is related to Bug ID: 6522704.  Thank you for providing additional information for our investigation.

You can review this bug and look for related issues on the Java Bug Database at:
http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=6522704
